data.actual_result: Long channel name continues to the next line and the server’s name is cut off.
data.expected_result: Long Channel name ends with ... and you can see the full server name
data.short_description: Server Name is cut off in long channel name from recent mentions.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a channel with an extremely long name. - Have someone to ping you there. - Click on Recent Mentions - Observe.
